articleTitle: Die Formel 1 trauert um einen ehemaligen Piloten
articleTitleTranslated: Formula 1 mourns the loss of a former driver
articleContent: Der Spanier Adrian Campos, der einen eigenen Rennstall in der Formel 2 und 3 hatte, verstarb 60-j√§hrig.
articleContentTranslated: The Spaniard Adrian Campos, who had his own racing team in Formula 2 and 3, died at the age of 60.
